author: Special Correspondent
text:
Workers of the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam on Saturday observed a token fast here protesting against the lackadaisical approach of the State and Union governments towards the frequent arrest of fishermen by Sri Lankan Navy and securing the release of boats seized.

A.K.S. Vijayan, district secretary, presided over the agitation near the head post office.

A large number of workers took part in it.
title: DMK workers observe fast
